name: Buffalo Financial Corporation
description: Buffalo Financial Corporation (BUFC) is a diversified financial services company specializing in banking, investment management, and insurance solutions. Established in 1998 and headquartered in Buffalo, New York, BUFC operates as a holding company for its subsidiary banks and financial services firms. The company is committed to providing personalized financial solutions to individuals, families, and businesses, focusing on customer satisfaction and community engagement. BUFC offers a range of products, including personal and business banking services, mortgages, investment accounts, retirement planning, and comprehensive insurance coverage. The firm prides itself on leveraging cutting-edge technology to enhance customer experiences, streamline operations, and provide innovative digital banking solutions. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and ethical investing, Buffalo Financial Corporation actively supports local communities through various philanthropic initiatives and partnerships. Its mission is to empower clients with the financial tools and knowledge necessary to achieve their goals while fostering a responsible and sustainable financial ecosystem.

seo.meta_title: Buffalo Financial Corporation | Comprehensive Financial Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Buffalo Financial Corporation, your trusted partner in banking, investment management, and insurance. Discover our commitment to community and customer satisfaction.

faq.answer: Sarah Johnson is the CEO of Buffalo Financial Corporation.

faq.answer: Buffalo Financial Corporation is headquartered in Buffalo, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Buffalo Financial Corporation was founded in 1998.
